definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Edhead : Do you think Spain will beat USA in Davis Cup semifinal ?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得西班牙會在戴維斯盃四強擊敗美國嗎？

sentences.english: Capello says England are aiming for at least a a place in the semi-finals.
sentences.chinese: 卡佩羅曾說英格蘭至少能衝進四強。

sentences.english: All they need to do now is break the mental barrier that going out at the quarter-final stage creates.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們要做的就是擺脫無法進入世界盃四強的心魔。

sentences.english: This weekend, college basketball will whittle its postseason tournament down to the Final Four.
sentences.chinese: 本週末，將惠特爾大學籃球比賽的季後賽做最後四強。

sentences.english: "Final Four" tournament will be conducted in Houston, Texas.
sentences.chinese: “最終四強”賽將在德州休斯頓進行。

definition: to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
to defend the crown (in sports championship)
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
